name: Fun Exploding Box Game
description:
Fun exploding box games - addictive puzzle game in which you have to strain the brain, would complete the game levels. Use strategic thinking, it will allow you to destroy all the boxes on the level. Prove to everyone that you are the best player, challenge your friends and win them!

  • Great game;
  • Stunning graphics;
  • Unusual levels;
  • 8/10 by the readers of the magazine appTime.
